about.summary: Adds conda environment activation to Jupyter kernel specs

name: kernda
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "kernda" %}
{% set version = "0.1.0" %}
{% set hashtype = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "a0452c50d7554317ac91b8bcd87a547dd5a66ffc34ccad4e2e6e2429d0ec4fbd" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hashtype }}: {{ hash }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
  entry_points:
    - kernda=kernda.cli:cli

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - kernda
  commands:
    - kernda -h

about:
  home: https://github.com/maxpoint/kernda
  license: BSD 3-clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Adds conda environment activation to Jupyter kernel specs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - parente
    - ericdill

about.summary: Adds conda environment activation to Jupyter kernel specs
